2. Surajit Das is the CBO of Yubi Flow, which is the supply chain division of Yubi. He is a serial entrepreneur who has worked and scaled startups across sectors.
3. Surajit is also a given name, which means "Conqueror of the Suras, Victorious devotee".

Virat Kohli is an Indian international cricketer who plays Test and ODI cricket for the national team and is a former captain in all formats. Here are some key details about him:

* Born: November 5, 1988, in Delhi, India
* Age: 36 years old (as of March 18, 2025)
* Batting Style: Right-hand bat
* Bowling Style: Right-arm medium
* Full Name: Virat Kohli
* He is the first player in ICC rankings to reach number one in all three formats of the game: Tests, ODIs, and T20Is.

Virat Kohli has been one of the most successful and dominant batsmen in international cricket, known for his aggressive style of play and exceptional fitness levels. He has led the Indian team to several victories and has been awarded numerous accolades for his performances.
